p: The aluminum chloride colorimetric method represented by Tuyen et al. [ 69] was applied to evaluate the TFC of extracts from A. virginicus with a slight alteration. In detail, the incubated reaction of 50 ÂµL of sample (in methanol) and an equal volume of 2% AlCl 3 was carried out. The result was measured after 15 min at 430 nm and presented as milligrams of rutin equivalent per one gram of sample dry weight (mg RE/g DW).
